name: Marvel comics - Generation X Multiple Choice Quiz | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Generation X are the youngest members of the X-Men. They are based in Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters. What was this placed called beforehand ?
questions.explanation:
Massachusetts Academy.

	The Academy is owned by Emma Frost, and is an affiliate of the Xavier Institute. The campus includes dormitories, headmasters' cabins, and a biosphere, in addition to classroom buildings, rec halls, and a state-of-the-art medical center.

questions.text: Who apart from Emma Frost runs the school ?
Which one of these X-men is not in Generation X ?
questions.explanation:
Mirage.

	Mirage was co-leader of the New Mutants before they became X-force.

questions.text: What is the name of Emma's Sister ?
Two small children live in a treehouse in the Bio-Sphere at the Academy, Who are they ?
What country did Chamber come from ?
Husk has a brother who was in the X-Men, Who was he ?
How many children are from the St.Croix family ?
questions.explanation:
4.

	They are Monet (M), Marius (Emplate), Claudette and Nicole (Penance)

questions.text: Which member of Gen X has a special relationship with Wolverine ?
questions.explanation:
Jubilee.

	Jubilee saved Wolverine's life way back when the X-men were in Australia.
